update.description:
Now, the help interface for segway -h will be:

‌

```
usage:

Semi-automated genome annotation. Please see: segway TASK -h, for stepsspecific to each task

optional arguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit
                   --version             show program's version number and exit

Segway Commands:
List of available tasks:

train
| -- train-init
| -- train-run
|	| -- train-run-round
| -- train-finish

annotate
| -- annotate-init
| -- annotate-run
| -- annotate-finish

posterior
| -- posterior-init
| -- posterior-run
| -- posterior-finish
```

While the segway annotate -h message will be:

```
usage:  annotate [-h] [-c] [--include-coords FILE] [--exclude-coords FILE][--output-label OUTPUT_LABEL] [--seg-table FILE] [-b FILE][--bigBed FILE]archives [archives ...] traindir annotatedir

positional arguments:
    archives
    traindir
    annotatedir

optional arguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit
```
update.title: Changed help interface for segway -h and segway annotate -h
update.reason: Mistaken garbage pull request. Covered by pull request #109.
